body: What was wrong with using `version` to check this? Why did we loose `SavedVersion`? It was a nice API that encapsulated the version checking that you have to do manually now
body_html: What was wrong with using version to check this? Why did we loose SavedVersion? It was a nice API that encapsulated the version checking that you have to do manually now
